articles.title: Kim Jong Un Inspects KPA Unit 842
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Inspects KPA Unit 842 
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the Workers' Party of Korea and people of the DPRK, inspected KPA Unit 842.
					 He gave soldiers of the unit a pair of binoculars and an automatic rifle as gifts before having a photo session with its service personnel. 
					
					 He first went round the room dedicated to the history of the unit. 
					
					 After hearing detailed explanation about the organization and development of the unit, he saw photos of successive commanding officers of the unit and recollected with deep emotion the dedications and tireless efforts of President Kim Il Sung and general secretary Kim Jong Il recorded in its history. 
					
					 The unit could grow to be a-match-for-a hundred combat unit capable of beating back the enemy's surprise attack at one blow under the wise leadership and deep care of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, he said. 
					
					 Praising the unit for conducting effective education through the room dedicated to its history, he stressed the need for its service personnel to perform feats in the efforts to round off the preparations for combat and bolster its fighting capability, always keeping in mind the glorious history of the unit. 
					
					 He went round military study rooms to acquaint himself with the combat preparations of the unit. 
					
					 He was satisfied to learn that all the commanding officers and soldiers are preparing themselves as a-match-for-a hundred stalwart fighters capable of performing any difficult duties in modern warfare. 
					
					 Looking with deep attention at combat operation plans and sand tables, he clearly indicated important tasks for exerting efforts for combat preparations in the light of the enemy's scenarios for aggression, methods of combat actions and characteristics of arms equipment. 
					
					 He set forth the tasks to be implemented by the unit, hearing a detailed report on the terrain of the area where it is stationed, defence theatre, combat and technical equipment and the deployment of forces. 
					
					 Then he went round a service personnel's hall, library and other facilities for ideological and cultural education to learn in detail how politico-ideological education is conducted among soldiers. 
					
					 He once again noted with appreciation that the unit is conducting political education in a unique manner after successfully building facilities for ideological and cultural education as required by the characteristic features of its soldiers and all of them are leading an ample cultural and emotional life. He called for paying primary attention to the politico-ideological education at all times. 
					
					 He took deep care of the living of the service personnel, making the rounds of a mess hall, kitchen, non-staple foodstuff store and other logistic facilities. 
					
					 He was pleased to hear the resolution made by the commanding officers to successfully conduct combat and political training and make thorough preparations and thus turn the unit into today's O Jung Hup-led 7th Regiment. He took hands of commanding officers one by one, reluctant to part from him, and told them to visit the unit often, wishing them good health and success in their trainings. 
					
					 He was accompanied by KPA General Pak Jae Gyong and KPA Lieut. General Ri Tu Song.

articles.title: DPRK Delegation Leaves
articles.content:
DPRK Delegation Leaves 
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- A DPRK delegation headed by Kim Kye Gwan, first vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, left here on Tuesday to attend DPRK-U.S. high-level talks.

articles.title: So Man Sul Dies
articles.content:
So Man Sul Dies
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- So Man Sul, deputy to the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK and labor hero, who was chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan died of a heart failure at the age of 84 at 7:05 p.m. on Feb. 19.
					 He was born into a poor peasant family in Yongil County, North Kyongsang Province on April 14, Juche 16 (1927) and went to Japan in 1941.
					
					 After the liberation of Korea he worked at Onoda branch of Yamaguchi Prefecture of the Federation of Koreans in Japan as a staffer for youth affairs and at Yamaguchi and Hiroshima Prefectural headquarters of the Democratic Youth League of Koreans in Japan as a full-time cadre.
					
					 After the association was formed by President Kim Il Sung on May 25, 1955, So Man Sul held the posts of section chief at the Hiroshima Prefectural headquarters of the association, its vice-chairman and chairman and then posts of director of the organizational department of the Central Standing Committee of the association, secretary general of the association, its vice-chairman and first vice-chairman and assumed the heavy responsibility as chairman of the association in May 2001.
					
					  He was awarded many state citations including Order of Kim Il Sung, Order of Kim Jong Il, the title of labor hero of the DPRK and the National Reunification Prize.
					
					 The Central Standing Committee of the association issued an obituary of him on Feb. 20. 
					
					 It said that So remained boundlessly loyal to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il till the last moments of his life and devoted himself to the patriotic work to usher in a new heyday of the association under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un and achieve the prosperity of the socialist homeland and national reunification.
					
					 The precious feats performed by him in the work of the association and the movement of Koreans in Japan will shine forever, it added.

articles.title: Message of Condolences to Chongryon Central Standing Committee
articles.content:
Message of Condolences to Chongryon Central Standing Committee
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- The Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly and the Cabinet of the DPRK on Feb. 20 sent a message of condolences to the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) over the death of So Man Sul, deputy to the SPA and chairman of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee.
					 So Man Sul was a veteran activist and ardent patriotic loyalist of the overseas Koreans movement who devotedly worked for the prosperity of the country and the development of the movement of Koreans in Japan with intense loyalty to President Kim Il Sung and general secretary Kim Jong Il and warm patriotism for a long period after the liberation of the country, the message said, and went on:
					
					 So Man Sul made a great contribution to glorifying generation after generation Chongryon, a genuine overseas citizens organization of the DPRK, as a patriotic pioneer, an example of patriotic devotion and a model of the world overseas compatriots movement, in hearty response to the Juche-based line and policies of the President on the movement of Koreans in Japan.
					
					 He worked hard for the independent and peaceful reunification of the country and its prosperity, the national rights and happiness of the Koreans in Japan till the last moments of his life while bravely overcoming the manifold difficulties and ordeals with the unshakable faith in Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 His death at a historic time when an immensely bright new era is unfolding before the Korean nation is a great loss to Chongryon and the country.
					
					 Though he passed away, the shining feats performed by him and the contribution he made to the victorious advance of the patriotic cause of Chongryon, single-mindedly trusting and following Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, will always go down in the history of the nation.

articles.title: Message from Guinean President
articles.content:
Message from Guinean President 
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the Workers' Party of Korea and people of the DPRK, received a message from Guinean President Alpha Conde on Feb. 15 on the occasion of the 70th birth anniversary of general secretary Kim Jong Il. 
					 The message said:
					
					 I, on behalf of the government and people of the Republic of Guinea and on my own behalf, express to Your Excellency deepest respect for the great leader of the Korean people HE Kim Jong Il on the occasion of his 70th birth anniversary. 
					
					 It gives me pleasure to take this opportunity to express once again my invariable will to join you in the efforts to boost the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and the Republic of Guinea. 
					
					 Please accept Your Excellency my best wishes for your good health and happiness and the friendly Korean people's prosperity. 
					
					 Sincerely yours.

articles.title: Gift from Peruvian
articles.content:
Gift from Peruvian
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un was presented with a gift by Estuardo Martinez Perez, president of the General Kim Jong Il Peruvian Amicable Institute, on Feb. 15.
					 The president handed over the gift to DPRK Ambassador to Peru Ri Mun Gyu.

articles.title: Floral Baskets from the political parties,organizations
articles.content:
Floral Baskets from the political parties,organizations
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- Political parties, organizations and institutions of different countries, international bodies and personages of various circles sent floral baskets to the DPRK missions in the relevant countries and regions between February 9 and 14 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Laid before full-length pictures of President Kim Il Sung standing together with Kim Jong Il were floral baskets from the Workers' Party, the People's Socialist Party, the Socialist Popular Party and the Socialist Party of Mexico, the Mexican National Coordinating Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, the Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism, the Mexican Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea, the Mexican Friend Association for Memory of President Kim Il Sung, the Mexican Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification and the Mexico-Korea Friendship Association, the Communist Party of Great Britain (Marxist-Leninist) and 16 Chinese institutions including the Hong Kong Zhonghwa Energy Fund Commission of China and the International Kim Il Sung Foundation.
					
					 Among those who presented the floral baskets were Coordinator (Leader) of the National Coordinating Committee of the Workers' Party of Mexico Alberto Anaya Gutierrez, the chairman of the National Workers' Party of Pakistan, Safdar Sindhu, secretary general of the Pakistan Trade Union Federation, Mohammad Ali Bara, secretary general of the Pakistan Peasants Committee, and Giancarlo Elia Valori, chairman of the Development Bank of the Mediterranean and chairman of the Italian General Investment Group.

articles.title: Iranian Ambassador Arranges Reception to Mark Day of Shining Star
articles.content:
Iranian Ambassador Arranges Reception to Mark Day of Shining Star
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- Iranian Ambassador Morteza Moradian Tuesday hosted a reception at his embassy to mark the birth anniversary of general secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Present there on invitation were Yang Hyong Sop, vice president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Pak Ui Chun, foreign minister, Ri Ryong Nam, minister of Foreign Trade, Jong Yong Su, minister of Labor, Kim Jong Suk, chairwoman of the Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, and officials concerned.
					
					 The ambassador said in a speech at the reception that Kim Jong Il was a great leader who worked heart and soul for the prosperity of socialist Korea, the people's happiness and the accomplishment of the cause of global independence.
					
					 He recalled that Iran and DPRK have supported with each other in the international arena, proceeding from their common stance, adding that the friendly relations between the two countries have steadily developed in different fields including politics, economy and culture.
					
					 The ambassador expressed belief that the Korean people would achieve greater successes in their efforts to implement the behests of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Yang Hyong Sop said in his speech Kim Jong Il who was born as a son of guerrillas wisely led the overall work of the party, state and army, thus turning the DPRK into an invulnerable socialist bulwark.
					
					 Kim Jong Il firmly defended socialism under the uplifted banner of Songun and made an immortal contribution to peace and security in the Korean Peninsula and the rest of the world, he added.
					
					 Yang expressed the country's will to strive for boosting the friendly and cooperative relations with Iran in the idea of independence, friendship and peace in the future, too.

articles.title: DPRK Ambassador Presents His Credentials to UK Queen
articles.content:
DPRK Ambassador Presents His Credentials to UK Queen
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- Hyon Hak Bong, DPRK ambassador to the UK, on Feb. 17 presented his credentials to Elizabeth II, queen of the UK.
					 She wished the dear respected Kim Jong Un great success in his work to build a thriving nation and improve the standard of people's living. 
					
					 She hoped everything will go on well in the DPRK under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Noting that the bilateral relations have developed on good terms over the last ten odd years since diplomatic relations were established between the two countries, she hoped that the two governments would positively cooperate with each other in various fields.

articles.title: Sends Birthday Spread to Centenarian
articles.content:
Sends Birthday Spread to Centenarian 
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un sent a birthday spread to Ri Yong Nyo, who lives in Hukkyo-ri, Hwangju County of North Hwanghae Province, on the centenary of her birth.
					 Born as a daughter of a servant before the country's liberation, she was subjected to all sorts of maltreatment and humiliation as a baby sitter from her age of nine.
					
					 It was after President Kim Il Sung liberated the country that she began leading a worthwhile life.
					
					 She still keeps herself in good health, benefited from the socialist public health system.
					
					 She likes to eat potato, soy-based food, bean paste, etc. and keeps herself busy tending a vegetable plot and raising domestic animals.

articles.title: Pothonggang Aquatic Products Shop Opens
articles.content:
Pothonggang Aquatic Products Shop Opens
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- The Pothonggang Aquatic Products Shop made its peculiar appearance on the banks of the picturesque River Pothong in Pyongyang. 
					 It has a total floor space of more than 3,940 square meters.
					
					 Its ground floor has stands selling fresh fishes, dried aquatic products, roe, shellfish, seafood and a variety of processed aquatic products. 
					
					 There are on its first and second floors restaurants where varieties of dishes including soup prepared with different kinds of fishes, noodle with seasoned raw-sliced fish, cold noodle and roast meat are served to customers.
					
					 An opening ceremony was held on Tuesday. 
					
					 Present there were Ryang Man Gil, chairman of the Pyongyang City People's Committee, officials concerned, employees of the shop, builders and Pyongyangites.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony, the participants looked round the shop.

articles.title: 16th Kimjongilia Festival Closes
articles.content:
16th Kimjongilia Festival Closes
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- The 16th Kimjongilia Festival was closed with due ceremony at the Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Exhibition on Tuesday. It was opened on Feb. 14 to mark the birth anniversary of general secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 The Festival was held with splendor as a festival in praises of the great man, drawing more than 400,000 visitors. 
					
					 Present at the ceremony were Kim Yong Nam, Kim Kim Nam and officials concerned, officials of ministries and national institutions, service personnel, working people, schoolchildren and the delegation of Korean residents in Japan.
					
					 The certificate of the top prize went to more than 10 units and the certificate of special prize to the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan.
					
					 The certificate of best prize went to more than 60 units.
					
					 The certificate of prize of merit and participation certificate were awarded to dozens of service personnel, working people, schoolchildren, overseas Koreans, foreigners and Chinese residents in the DPRK and the diploma of cultivation technology prize to cultivators of those units which displayed Kimjongilia by successfully bringing potted flowers into full bloom on a scientific and technological basis.

articles.title: Concert Commemorating Day of Shining Star Goes on
articles.content:
Concert Commemorating Day of Shining Star Goes on
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- The concert "The Hearts Following the Sun" commemorating the Day of the Shining Star given by the Unhasu Orchestra continues in Pyongyang.
					 Officials of ministries and national institutions and people in the city enjoyed the concert on Tuesday.
					
					 The concert began with chorus "Smile of Love". Put on the stage were such colorful numbers as serial songs of masterpieces "Embrace of Country" and "O Korea, I Will Add Glory to Thee", female solo and pangchang "We Will Become Flowers Heralding Spring before Others" and chorus "We Advance along the Road to Mt. Paektu".
					
					 The performers highly sang of the revolutionary life of leader Kim Jong Il, a brilliant life of a peerless great man who led the protracted revolutionary cause of Juche and Songun to victory and glory with intense loyalty to the idea and the cause of the President.
					
					 It showed the invariable will of the Korean army and people to hold their fatherly leader in high esteem as the eternal sun and successfully carry forward the revolutionary cause of Juche started on Mt. Paektu.

articles.title: DPRK Service Personnel Loudly Shout "Protect Kim Jong Un"
articles.content:
DPRK Service Personnel Loudly Shout "Protect Kim Jong Un"
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- The Feb. 17 issue of Huan Qiu Shibao published by the People's Daily of China carried the following articles written by its correspondents in various countries under the title "The DPRK service personnel shouting at the top of their voices slogan 'Protect Kim Jong Un':" 
					 The DPRK held various events including a military parade on Feb. 16 in commemoration of the 70th birth anniversary of general secretary Kim Jong Il. This was the greatest event since he passed away last year.
					
					 Media and news analysts of Japan, south Korea, U.S. and European countries made a lot of efforts to find out uncommon signs.
					
					 The Reuters said that leader Kim Jong Un guided this commemoration event, adding that this indicates a smooth transition of power in the DPRK.
					
					 After the passing of Kim Jong Il public opinion of Japan and south Korea predicted various scenarios related to possible disturbance in the DPRK.
					
					 Public opinion of Japan on Feb. 16 admitted that it was too pessimistic at the outset and "lacked" understanding of the DPRK.
					
					 Under the title "Flowers, Military Parade and Pledge of Loyalists" the AP reported about the military parade.
					
					  It said: Leader Kim Jong Un bowed deeply before a large portrait of a smiling leader Kim Jong Il in the Kumsusan Memorial Palace in Pyongyang, the capital. Army and government officials and citizens followed to pay their respects. Later, leader Kim Jong Un and other officials watched as thousands of goose-stepping soldiers marched by, followed by military jeeps and trucks carrying artillery guns and rocket launchers. Military music boomed and people waved artificial flowers.
					
					 The AFP conveyed news that thousands of three services of the Korean People's Army shouted the slogan "Let's dedicate our lives to protect Kim Jong Un".
					
					 Choongang Ilbo of south Korea reported that leader Kim Jong Un displayed his leadership ability through his field guidance to different units. 
					
					 The Reuters said on Feb. 16 that young leader Kim Jong Un had already provided field guidance more than ten times. He talked to soldiers with smile on his face. He shook hands of officers and talked to common soldiers.
					
					  The birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il was instituted as the "Day of the Shining Star" in the DPRK.
					
					The Kimjongilia festival, stamp exhibition, sports demonstration performance, a ceremony of unveiling statues, etc. took place one after another. National flags, flags of the Workers' Party of Korea, multi-colored flags and balloons were seen in different parts of Pyongyang and various kinds of flowers were put on the flower stands of the streets in the city.
					
					 There was a change in the tone of mass media of Japan on Feb. 16. 
					
					 The Shukanshincho said that Japan, the U.S. and south Korea were too pessimistic in predicting the situation in the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK is still advancing, pursuant to the line of leader Kim Jong Il. Japan's speculation about the DPRK seems to be like a "novel" at present.
					
					 The international community seems to have little understanding of the DPRK.
					
					 TBS TV of Japan in a commentary on Feb. 16 said that the DPRK, which had given rise to serious concern of the international community about stability, has fully established the leadership of Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 Under the title "Leader Kim Jong Il Clearly Indicates Road" a Japanese scholar on Asia-Pacific affairs told Huan Qiu Shibao on Feb. 16 that "Koreans' tears during mourning period were not false. We should renew our understanding of the DPRK".
					
					 Asian Times of Hong Kong on Feb. 16 posted on its website an article titled "Leader Kim Jong Il is a beacon brightly indicating the road". 
					
					 The article said:
					
					 "It is the view of the Korean people and the rest of the world that leader Kim Jong Il was the greatest national hero and patriot in Korea's history spanning five thousand years. He was the greatest  and staunchest leader in the world history. In the six rounds of big confrontation with war-like Americans, he led the DPRK to emerge victorious, without having his sword stained even with a drop of blood, making it possible for the land of morning calm of ancestors to escape a war. He defended the Korean people so that they might not suffer the same pain as what was done by Iraqis, Libyans and Afghans due to the U.S. military invasion.

articles.title: Ten Major Crimes Committed by Lee Myung Bak against Reunification in Four Years of His Office
articles.content:
Ten Major Crimes Committed by Lee Myung Bak against Reunification in Four Years of His Office
						
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- The National Reunification Institute issued a memorandum on Tuesday laying bare the ten major crimes committed by the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors against the reunification during four years of his office. 
					 The memorandum said:
					
					 After coming to power, Lee Myung Bak nullified the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, negated the idea of "By our nation itself", their main spirit, and debased the June 15 era as the "lost decade".
					
					 He has not implemented any of the contents of the north-south joint declarations and brought to naught all the achievements made in the June 15 era.
					
					 He categorically rejected dialogue and malignantly flouted and desecrated our sincere efforts for it, asserting that "south Korea would not have dialogue at which it is dragged by the north," "It is good to spend five years without south-north dialogue" and "he is ready to keep the inter-Korean relations in a state of freeze till the end of the tenure of his office". 
					
					 The group fabricated a provocative case and used them for taking what it called "May 24 step," totally disallowing non-governmental contact and exchange.
					
					 These moves brought visits of people of different social standings between the north and the south to suspension, making it impossible for non-governmental organizations to have any contact and compelling the north and the south to hold joint events including meetings for the June 15 reunification separately.
					
					 The puppet group laid down absurd "four principles to govern the operations towards the north", claiming "it is impossible to have economic cooperation as long as nuclear weapons exist", "The drain of resources for the north for the past decade resulted in nukes and missiles" and "Don't think inter-Korean relations would improve through cooperation."
					
					 The puppet group unilaterally brought the tour of Mt. Kumgang to suspension under the pretext of the tourist case which occurred due to her wrongdoing after describing it as someone's "financial resource" and the like. 
					
					 Claiming that the work at the Kaesong Industrial Zone is of help to the north, the group worked hard to halt it. Finding it impossible to achieve its aim, the group resorted to a "withering-to-death operation" aimed at largely weakening operations there, putting pressure upon entrepreneurs and restricting the entry and exit of materials, the number of persons and vehicles.
					
					 Due to the group's moves to scuttle the cooperation the south Korean enterprises operating there suffered a total of more than 13 billion dollars over the last four years. Many enterprises which had staked their fate on the north-south cooperation went bankrupt. Deprived of their means of living, many inhabitants committed suicides.
					
					 In four years of his office, Lee had never been the first to propose any talks or contact concerning Red Cross or humanitarian issues including the issue of reunion of separated families and relatives. When his delegates appeared at north-south Red Cross working contacts and talks arranged thanks to the positive efforts made by the north side, they only hatched plots and resorted to obstructive moves, talking about "south Korean abductees", " POWs of ROK Army" and "regularization."
					
					  The fact that just two reunions of separated families and relatives took place in four years since 2008 when the group came to power clearly proves the insincere approach taken by it towards humanitarian undertakings.
					
					 As far the delivery of humanitarian goods between the north and the south is concerned, Lee Myung Bak deterred even one gram of rice and cement from being sent to the north, citing "transparency" and "diversion to military purpose".
					
					 In the meantime, the Lee group undisguisedly perpetrated the operations for luring or abducting inhabitants of the DPRK en masse.
					
					 It, at the same time, brutally executed leading members of pro-reunification movement organizations and other personages on charges of violation of fascist laws after branding them as "servants of the north", "pro-communists" and "spies."
					
					 The number of cases of suppressing reunification movement organizations on charges of violation of "Security Law" more than quadrupled over that under the previous regime and the number of the pro-reunification patriots who had been put to custody for no reason reached hundreds.
					
					  Lee Myung Bak has worked with bloodshot eyes to escalate the confrontation of systems, negating the fundamental principles of national reunification and north-south ties and talking about "unification under liberal democracy", "German-style unification" and "contingency".
					
					  It even hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and decried the best socialist system, kicking up anti-DPRK human rights campaign. It claimed the "south cannot exist with the north in this bright world", the "north should not be considered as compatriots with whom to live together" and the "north's regime and its inhabitants should be dealt with separately".
					
					 Seized by "the theory of collapse", the group talked nonsense that "unification may come at midnight like a burglar." It got crazy with the moves to escalate the confrontation with compatriots, staging such farce as "unification education" and "unification tax" and reviving "the theory of principal enemy." 
					
					 While in office, the Lee regime supplemented and rounded off scenarios for war of aggression against the north including OPLAN 5027 and OPLAN 5029 in league with its American master. It staged Key Resolve, Foal Eagle and Ulji Freedom Guardian and other large-scale war maneuvers to put them into practice.
					
					 In four years of its office the Lee regime staged more than 1 600 war maneuvers against the north.
					
					 In wanton violation of the October 4 declaration, the Lee group massively beefed up aggression troops in areas around five islands in the West Sea and staged dangerous saber-rattling targeted against the DPRK.
					
					 In March and November 2010 the puppet group perpetrated such hideous provocations as the "Cheonan" warship incident and the Yonphyong Island shelling incident, pushing the situation to the brink of war.
					
					 Far from expressing consolation and condolences to the compatriots grieving the great loss to the nation, the Lee regime put the puppet army, police, government employees and even embassies abroad on emergency alert, inciting confrontation and war fever. It even barred south Koreans from visiting Pyongyang. It prevented them from expressing condolences and destroyed incense-burning altars.
					
					 Considering the great loss to the nation as a golden opportunity of achieving its sinister goal, the Lee regime ran the whole gamut of intrigues to undermine the single-minded unity of the people in the DPRK and seriously mocked at the tears shed by them.
					
					 The memorandum says in conclusion: The north-south relations cannot escape catastrophe and the nation is fated to meet only war disasters as long as the Lee group stays in power. This is the final conclusion drawn from the four years of his office and its summation.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Five-point Policy for Great National Unity
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Five-point Policy for Great National Unity 
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- It was a great exploit of general secretary Kim Jong Il that he set forth the five-point policy for great national unity as it brought about a new turning point of national unity by carrying forward President Kim Il Sung's idea and line for great unity of the nation. Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says this in a bylined article. 
					 On April 18, 1998 Kim Jong Il laid down the five-point policy which calls for uniting under the banner of patriotism while preserving the principle of national independence, improving the north-south relations, struggling against outsiders' domination and anti-reunification forces and calling on all Koreans to realize mutual contacts, dialogue and solidarity and alliance. 
					
					 The five-point policy has always served as a banner of victory in the struggle for national reconciliation and unity and the reunification of the country for its justice, realistic nature and vitality, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il set forth the policy of uniting under the banner of patriotism, the banner of national reunification, thereby providing an ideological groundwork whereby the Koreans who unanimously desire the reunification of the country with ardent patriotism may promote great national unity. 
					
					 It is required by national unity and the reunification of the country to improve the north-south relations. The history of the national reunification movement clearly proves that only when the inter-Korean relations are improved, is it possible to dynamically promote national unity. 
					
					 It is one of the important ways for great national unity for all Koreans to visit each other and make contacts, develop dialogue and achieve solidarity and alliance. 
					
					 The five-point policy laid down by Kim Jong Il could put the cause of great unity of the Korean nation on a higher stage which can provide a sure guarantee for the accomplishment of the cause of national reunification. 
					
					 The Korean nation can surely achieve reconciliation, unity and the cause of national reunification when it implements the five-point policy.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Dismisses Proposed "Reunion of Separated Families" as Hypocritical
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Dismisses Proposed "Reunion of Separated Families" as Hypocritical 
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- The south Korean authorities recently let the south Korean Red Cross propose a working-level contact for "reunion of separated families," asserting "it is an urgent task that brooks no further delay".
					 They are creating impression that they are interested in mending the north-south relations and settling humanitarian issues, prattling "the ball is in the north's court."
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 The south Korean authorities' proposed "reunion of separated families" is nothing but a mean burlesque disclosing the ulterior intention of those who feel guilty. 
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group is wholly to blame for having failed to properly arrange the reunions of separated families and relatives so far as it drove the north-south relations to catastrophe by escalating confrontation with fellow countrymen and disallowed any dialogue and cooperation.
					
					 Lurking behind the proposed reunion are sinister aims.
					
					 It is aimed at hiding the traitorous nature of its "policy toward the north", which resulted in the collapse of the north-south relations, and escaping the public criticism of its moves to escalate the confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					  The south Korean conservative authorities are now in the grip of a serious ruling crisis, strongly censured and condemned by the public for the total failure of their policy of confrontation.
					
					 The conservative group finds itself on pins and needles as it feels uneasy that if things go on like this, it can be beaten in the upcoming "parliamentary" election.
					
					 That is why the group is kicking up such fuss, proposing the working contact in a bid to win public mind-set.
					
					 No wonder, people of different social standings in south Korea are chiding the authorities for pretending to be concerned for the reunion.

articles.title: Minju Joson S. Korean Authorities' Suppression of Progressive Forces Assailed
articles.content:
Minju Joson S. Korean Authorities' Suppression of Progressive Forces Assailed 
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- The south Korean authorities are cracking down upon the progressive pro-reunification movement bodies and figures on charges of the ill-famed "Security Law". This is nothing but a reckless fascist action against reunification.
					 Minju Joson Tuesday says this in a bylined commentary.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 Ri Chang Gi, publisher of Jaju Minbo, is a progressive media man recognized by all Koreans. 
					
					 He wrote articles calling for the pullout of the U.S. forces from south Korea and the repeal of the SL, objectively dealing with the reality of the DPRK which has won one victory after another in the confrontation with the U.S. and the might of the Songun politics. 
					
					 This being a hard reality, the group arrested him by invoking the SL which should have been abolished. This only brought to light its true colors as anti-reunification elements. The same can be said of the suppression of the People for Achieving Peace and Reunification. Recently the organization has struggled to check the building of Jeju naval base, disclosing the dangerous nature of its construction in solidarity with progressive political parties and civic and social organizations.
					
					 There is no ground whatsoever for the group to crack down upon the members of the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration, "the Council for Promoting the Reunification of Our nation by Federal Formula" and the Society of Victims of "SL".
					
					 The aims sought by the group in intensifying the crackdown upon the above-said organizations, disclosing their true colors as anti-reunification and confrontation maniacs, are to tide over the worsening ruling crisis and help the "Saenuri Party" stay in power through the forthcoming parliamentary election and "presidential" election and thus ensure its security after leaving its office.

articles.title: Minju Joson Reveals Pro-U.S. Consciousness of Japan Defense Chief
articles.content:
Minju Joson S. Korean Authorities' Suppression of Progressive Forces Assailed 
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- The south Korean authorities are cracking down upon the progressive pro-reunification movement bodies and figures on charges of the ill-famed "Security Law". This is nothing but a reckless fascist action against reunification.
					 Minju Joson Tuesday says this in a bylined commentary.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 Ri Chang Gi, publisher of Jaju Minbo, is a progressive media man recognized by all Koreans. 
					
					 He wrote articles calling for the pullout of the U.S. forces from south Korea and the repeal of the SL, objectively dealing with the reality of the DPRK which has won one victory after another in the confrontation with the U.S. and the might of the Songun politics. 
					
					 This being a hard reality, the group arrested him by invoking the SL which should have been abolished. This only brought to light its true colors as anti-reunification elements. The same can be said of the suppression of the People for Achieving Peace and Reunification. Recently the organization has struggled to check the building of Jeju naval base, disclosing the dangerous nature of its construction in solidarity with progressive political parties and civic and social organizations.
					
					 There is no ground whatsoever for the group to crack down upon the members of the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration, "the Council for Promoting the Reunification of Our nation by Federal Formula" and the Society of Victims of "SL".
					
					 The aims sought by the group in intensifying the crackdown upon the above-said organizations, disclosing their true colors as anti-reunification and confrontation maniacs, are to tide over the worsening ruling crisis and help the "Saenuri Party" stay in power through the forthcoming parliamentary election and "presidential" election and thus ensure its security after leaving its office.

articles.title: Compatriots Organization in U.S. Slams S. Korean Authorities' Talk about "Dialogue"
articles.content:
Compatriots Organization in U.S. Slams S. Korean Authorities' Talk about "Dialogue"
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- The Federation of Koreans in the U.S. made public a commentary on Feb. 17 denouncing the south Korean minister of Unification for his reckless remark about "dialogue," a mockery of the nation.
					 The commentary recalled that the minister again referred to "dialogue", urging "the north to abide by the spirit of the south-north basic agreement".
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak "government" has been thrown into a predicament, forsaken by the people for bringing the inter-Korean relations to a collapse through its confrontation with compatriots and the pursuance of the fascist policy, it noted, adding that now it got so shameless as to talk about "dialogue."
					
					 The commentary went on: Ever since they came to power, the south Korean authorities have frequently staged military exercises against the north in collusion with the U.S. in a bid to stifle compatriots. They have pursued the policy of confrontation with the DPRK while setting in motion conservative media for every form of malignant false propaganda and smear campaign against the north. 
					
					 Nobody believes what the south Korean authorities talk about "dialogue".
					
					 If the Lee Myung Bak "government" truly stands for dialogue, it should halt the joint war exercises targeted against the north it is planning to stage with the U.S. and immediately stop the anti-DPRK confrontation racket, urged the commentary.

articles.title: S. Korean Unification Ministry's Rhetoric Flayed
articles.content:
S. Korean Unification Ministry's Rhetoric Flayed
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- The south Korean "Ministry of Unification" recently presented self-praising materials saying that the Lee Myung Bak regime "provided groundwork" for normalizing the north-south relations during his four-year term.
					 It spread the material saying about "meaningful achievement" at a time when the north-south relations were plunged into the complete deadlock.
					
					 This is sordid and mean trick to escape from the responsibility for the stalled north-south relations and evade the punishment by history.
					
					 It is preposterous for the Lee Myung Bak regime, which is to blame for the stalled north-south relations, to talk about "provision of foundation" for the improvement of the relations.
					
					 The Lee regime is the chief culprit that has brought the north-south relations to a total collapse.
					
					 No sooner had the regime come to power than it called the June 15 era a "lost decade". It has pursued "waiting strategy" aiming at "contingency" in the DPRK.
					
					 It denied the historic June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and put up the "no nukes, opening and 3,000 dollars", unprecedented confrontation policy for confrontation of social systems and invasion of the north, as its "north policy". From the beginning it decried "By our nation itself", an idea of reunification common to the nation, groundlessly branding it as the "north's strategy".
					
					 It declared that it would subordinate the north-south relations to the relations with outsiders and opted to work as a servant carrying out the U.S. colonial domination and implementing its policy of aggression.
					
					 It has insisted on confrontation with fellow countrymen and confrontation of social systems, denying national reconciliation and unity and reunification of the country, thus creating mistrust between the north and 
					
					the south and turning the inter-Korean ties into those of extreme hostility.
					
					 It is just the Lee group which checked overnight multifarious dialogues which had been active after the publication of the June 15 joint declaration. It, raising nuclear issue and "apology" as precondition, has 
					
					broken off the dialogues that had been arranged by the efforts exerted by the DPRK.
					
					 The situation clearly proves that the stalled north-south relations can not be improved but will become worse over time, as long as there is anti-reunification confrontation policy of the Lee Myung Bak conservative group.
					
					 The group of traitors can never escape from the punishment by history as the sworn enemy of the nation that betrayed the fellow countrymen.

articles.title: Korean Book, Photo and Fine Art Exhibition Opens in China
articles.content:
Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- A Korean book, photo and fine art exhibition was opened at the Shijiazhuang city gallery in Hebei Province, China on Feb. 16, the birth anniversary of general secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Displayed in its venue were works of the peerlessly great persons, photos of his Songun leadership feats and his historic visits to China, books and photos, multimedia and fine art works introducing Songun Korea.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were officials of the Shijiazhuang    City People's Government of Hebei Province, China, the City Cultural Radio and TV, Newspaper and Press Bureau and the Hebei Provincial Fine Art Association and citizens. 
					
					 Present there on invitation were officials of the Korean Overseas Exhibition General Bureau and staff members of the DPRK embassy in Beijing.
					
					 The floor was taken by the deputy mayor of the Shijiazhuang         City People's Government of Hebei Province, the vice-chairman of the Hebei Provincial Fine Art Association, and others.
					
					 The speakers expressed belief that the exhibition would positively contribute to boosting the Sino-DPRK relations of good-neighborliness, friendship and cooperation and promoting friendship and mutual understanding between the two peoples.
					
					 The exhibition will go on till Feb. 24.

articles.title: Ahmadinejad Accuses Foreigners of Creating Regional Problems
articles.content:
Ahmadinejad Accuses Foreigners of Creating Regional Problems
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- Iranian President Mahmoud Ahmadinejad said on Friday that several of the problems have been imposed on the region by outside forces.
					 "There are countries which have targeted our region for their dominance," the Iranian President said at a joint press conference along with Afghan and Pakistani presidents at the conclusion of a trilateral summit. 
					
					 "We should oppose to outsiders' intervening in our affairs," Ahmadinejad said.

articles.title: Cuban FM Accuses U.S.
articles.content:
Cuban FM Accuses U.S.
 Havana, February 20 (KCNA) -- Cuban Foreign Minister Bruno Rodriguez Parrilla resolutely accused the U.S. in his opening speech of a meeting of the Political Council of the Bolivarian Alliance for the Peoples of Our America (ALBA) in Havana on Wednesday.
					 He said the United States is yet to show its alleged willingness to change its policy towards the region according to what was expressed at the Summit of the Americas in Trinidad and Tobago in 2009.

articles.title: Thai PM Seeks 162 Million USD Budget for Water Projects
articles.content:
Thai PM Seeks 162 Million USD Budget for Water Projects
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- The Thai Prime Minister's trip to flood-prone areas ended on Friday and she planned to seek about 162 million U.S. dollars for more than a hundred projects to prevent flood this year. 
					 Prime Minister Yingluck Shinawatra said on Friday that she will seek an additional budget of about 5 billion baht or 162 million U.S. dollars to implement 117 water management projects from the Cabinet next week.

articles.title: Hezbollah Denies Attacks against Israeli Targets
articles.content:
Hezbollah Denies Attacks against Israeli Targets
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- The head of Shiite armed group Hezbollah denied Thursday his party's involvement in recent security incidents in some countries against Israeli diplomats.
					 "We, in Hezbollah, played no part in these incidents," Sheikh Hasan Nasrallah said during a televised speech during a rally to commemorate Hezbollah's slain commanders.
					
					 "Our revenge will not be against Israeli soldiers or diplomats," Nasrallah said.

articles.title: Gazans Call on Israel to Free Islamic Jihad Leader from Jail
articles.content:
Gazans Call on Israel to Free Islamic Jihad Leader from Jail
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- Thousands of Palestinians demonstrated on Friday in Gaza city and called on Israel to immediately release an Islamic Jihad (Holy War) leader who has been on a hunger strike for two months. 
					 The demonstrators took to the city's main street, waving Palestinian and Islamic Jihad flags.
					
					Ismail Haneya, premier of Hamas de facto government, who joined the rally, told reporters that "we all are united behind one of the prisoners' symbols who goes on a hunger strike to condemn the repressive Israeli measures."

articles.title: Steady Unemployment Crisis in U.S.
articles.content:
Steady Unemployment Crisis in U.S.
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- The U.S. Labor Department said on Feb. 16 that the initial jobless claims were 348,000 in the week ended Feb. 11.

articles.title: Birth Anniversary Commemorated in Russia
articles.content:
Birth Anniversary Commemorated in Russia
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- A Kimjongilia exhibition took place with due ceremony in Vladivostok, Russia on February 9 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of general secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Present at the opening ceremony were the special envoy  of the administrative governor of Maritime Territory, officials of the Administration of Maritime Territory, the Mission of the Foreign Ministry in Vladivostok, the Artyom City Administration, the Vladivostok City Administration and Assembly, the "United Russia" Party, the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, "A Just Russia", Far Eastern State University of Russia, the Vlad Bread Factory, the Prima-Media News Agency, the Komsomolskaya Pravda, the Vladivostok Daily and masses.
					
					 The special envoy said that there exist in this world various kinds of flowers to boast their beauties and scent but there is no flower praising a great man like Kimjongilia.
					
					 He stressed that he would make positive efforts to cultivate Kimjongilia deeply rooted in the land of the Far East and expand the sphere of its dissemination.
					
					 The chairman of the Vladivostok City Assembly noted that he was fascinated by the beauty of Kimjongilia, adding that he would widely introduce and spread the stories about this flower to the Russian people and take the lead in cultivating and disseminating the famous flower in the future.
					
					 An associate professor at Far Eastern State University of Russia said that Kimjongilia could be acclimatized to the environment of Maritime Territory thanks to the profound reverence of the Russian people for Kim Jong Il. There is no boundary as regards the reverence of all people for Kim Jong Il, he added.

articles.title: "February Spring Concert" Given in U.S.
articles.content:
"February Spring Concert" Given in U.S.
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- The "February Spring Concert" was given in Manhattan, New York on Feb. 11 to mark the birth anniversary of general secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 The concert began with orchestral music "Song of General Kim Jong Il" and "General of Korea" conducted by Ri Jun Mu, head of the Uruk Symphony Orchestra. The concert included female solo "My Blessed Life", violin solo "We Will Be Loyal Down through Generations" and orchestral music "Rainbow of National Reunification".
					
					 During the performance of orchestral music "Footsteps", the audience sent warm applauses, cheering the artistes.
					
					 Seeing the concert were members of the DPRK permanent mission at the United Nations, diplomats of different countries including Russia, Australia, New Zealand, Ireland and Italy and Koreans in the U.S. and American personages.

articles.title: Birth Anniversary Observed in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Birth Anniversary Observed in Foreign Countries
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- Events were held in various countries between Feb. 8 and 12 on the birth anniversary of general secretary Kim Jong Il. They included a remembrance meeting, meeting, book and photo exhibition, film show and seminar in Sweden, Switzerland, Libya, Bulgaria, Bangladesh, France and Ethiopia.
					 On display in their venues were books and photos of the Songun revolutionary leadership feats of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Korean films shown included "Arms of Korea" and "Fireworks for a Thriving Nation".
					
					 The chairman of the Sweden-Korea Friendship Association noted Kim Jong Il's Songun politics paved the way for ensuring peace and security in Northeast Asia and achieving the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea on the basis of the ideal of "By our nation itself". 
					
					 The reporters including the chief of the Bulgarian Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and speakers said all the achievements made by the Korean people and the miracles performed by them in the past are associated with the august name of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Garib Newaz, president of the Bangladesh People's League, said Kim Jong Il was an outstanding leader who led the cause of independence against imperialism to victory and the world clearly realized the great vitality and validity of the Songun politics through the stirring reality of the DPRK.
					
					 Jean Marie Lambret, chief of the French Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Idea, and the chairman of a regional committee of the France-Korea Friendship Association noted the single-minded unity, politico-ideological might, tremendous military capability and self-supporting national economy serve as the main characteristics of the DPRK and all of them constitute the immortal feats performed by Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Messages to the dear respected Kim Jong Un were adopted at the events in France, Sweden, Switzerland and Libya.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un inspecciona la Unidad 842 del EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un inspecciona la Unidad 842 del EPC
 Pyongyang, 21 de febrero (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea y Maximo Dirigente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y el pueblo coreano, inspecciono la Unidad 842 del EPC.
					 Dio como recuerdos los binoculos y fusil automatico a los militares de la unidad y se fotografio con ellos. 
					
					 Primero, estuvo en la sala de presentacion del historial.
					
					 Luego de escuchar las explicaciones detalladas sobre la organizacion y la trayectoria de desarrollo de la unidad, recordo con emocion los trabajos y esfuerzos del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il registrados en la historia de la unidad viendo las fotos de los sucesivos comandantes de ella.
					
					 Gracias a la sabia direccion y minuciosa atencion del Presidente y el Dirigente, la unidad pudo crecer como destacamento preparado para el combate uno vs. cien rivales y capaz de rechazar de un solo golpe la invasion sorpresiva de los enemigos, dijo.
					
					 Encomiando la marcha activa de la educacion a traves de la sala de presentacion del historial, subrayo que los militares deben realizar meritos en perfeccionar los preparativos de combate y fortalecer la combatividad de la unidad teniendo siempre presente el orgulloso historial de su destacamento.
					
					 Pasando revista a las salas de estudios militares, averiguo el estado de disposicion de combate de la unidad.
					
					 Se mostro muy satisfecho de que la unidad formara a todos los comandantes y militares como combatientes capaces de combatir a solas contra  cien enemigos y cumplir independiente y perfectamente cualquier dificil mision de la guerra moderna. 
					
					 Viendo con atencion los proyectos de operacion y las maquetas, aclaro los problemas importantes en que debe centrarse la preparacion de combate teniendo en cuenta el intento con que lanzan la agresion los enemigos, su modo de accion en el combate y las especificaciones de sus armamentos.
					
					 Tras escuchar en detalles el parte sobre la topografia y objetos terrestres de donde esta ubicada la unidad y sobre el estado de distribucion de equipos tecnicos de combate y efectivos, presento tareas importantes que la unidad debe cumplir en lo adelante.
					
					 Recorrio la Casa de Militares, la biblioteca y otros establecimientos de educacion ideologica y cultural haciendo conocimiento detallado de la marcha de educacion ideo-politica a los militares.
					
					 Volvio a apreciar el hecho de que aquellos establecimientos estan bien acondicionados conforme a las caracteristicas de los uniformados, se realiza fresca y profundamente la labor politica, todos los militares de la unidad llevan una vida suficientemente culta, y destaco la necesidad de prestar siempre atencion primordial a la educacion ideo-politica.
					
					 En su recorrido por el comedor, la cocina, el almacen de alimentos subsidiarios y otras instalaciones de intendencia, atendio minuciosamente las condiciones de la vida de los uniformados.
					
					 Luego de escuchar muy satisfecho la decision de los comandantes de la unidad de realizar perfectamente los ejercicios y preparativos del combate y convertir su unidad en el Septimo Regimiento de O Jung Hup de hoy, les estrecho la mano uno por uno prometiendoles venir con frecuencia y encomendandoles que ejercitaran bien con buena salud.
					
					 Le acompanaron en esta ocasion el general de ejercito del EPC, Pak Jae Gyong, y el teniente general del EPC, Ri Tu Song.

articles.title: Parte delegacion coreana para conversaciones RPDC-EE.UU.
articles.content:
Parte delegacion coreana para conversaciones RPDC-EE.UU.
 Pyongyang, 21 de febrero (ACNC) -- La delegacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea encabezada por el primer viceministro de Relaciones Exteriores, Kim Kye Gwan, partio el dia 21 de esta capital para participar en las conversaciones de alto nivel RPDC-EE.UU.

articles.title: IRP revela 10 crimenes anti-reunificacion de Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
IRP revela 10 crimenes anti-reunificacion de Lee Myung Bak 
 Pyongyang, 21 de febrero (ACNC) -- El Instituto de la Reunificacion de la Patria (IRP) hizo publico el dia 21 el memorando para revelar los 10 crimenes anti-reunificacion de la banda de los traidores surcoreanos de Lee Myung Bak cometidos durante 4 anos de su mandato. 
					 Segun el documento, durante su mandato, Lee Myung Bak invalido la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre, nego el espiritu principal de estas declaraciones, ideal de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales", e insulto la era del 15 de Junio como "diez anos perdidos". 
					
					 No ejecuto ni un articulo indicado en las declaraciones conjuntas Norte-Sur y echo a perder todos los exitos alcanzados en la era del 15 de Junio. 
					
					 Diciendo que "no accederia al dialogo dejandome llevar por el Norte", "no importa la suspension del dialogo durante un lustro" y "estoy decidido a dejar en congelacion las relaciones Sur-Norte hasta el final de mi mandato", nego totalmente el dialogo entre ambas partes coreanas, burlo y ultrajo siniestramente los esfuerzos sinceros de la parte Norte por el dialogo. 
					
					 Invento los casos provocativos y prohibio los contactos y el intercambio entre los civiles insistiendo en las llamadas "medidas del 24 de mayo". 
					
					 Debido a tales maniobras de la banda titere surcoreana, han sido interrumpidos las visitas de distintos estratos y los contactos de las entidades civiles y tuvieron que celebrarse por separados en el Norte y el Sur los actos programados como los conjuntos, incluso el acto del 15 de junio por la reunificacion. 
					
					 Ademas, presento los "4 principios para el trabajo con el Norte" disparateando que "es imposible la cooperacion economica mientras existen armas nucleares", "lo donado al Norte durante un decenio se convirtio en armas nucleares y misiles" y "no crean que las relaciones Sur-Norte se mejoraran simplemente por la cooperacion". 
					
					 En cuanto al turismo al monte Kumgang, lo critico como "fuente de ingresos" para alguien y lo interrumpio unilateralmente pretextando el incidente de una turista surcoreana ocurrido por culpa de ella misma. 
					
					 Trato de quebrar los negocios en la zona industrial de Kaesong diciendo que este trabajo contribuye solo al Norte. Pero, cuando no pudo alcanzar su meta, ejercio presion sobre las empresas relacionadas y les restringio el acceso de materiales, personal y vehiculos. 
					
					 Debido a tales maniobras de la banda titere surcoreana contra la cooperacion bilateral, las empresas surcoreanas sufrieron durante 4 anos pasados las perdidas de mas de 13 mil millones de USD y muchas empresas que se mantenian de la cooperacion Norte-Sur se dieron en bancarrota y algunos habitantes se suicidaron. 
					
					 Durante 4 anos en el poder, Lee Myung Bak no propuso nunca primero las conversaciones y contactos de la cruz roja y de humanitarismo para el encuentro de familiares y parientes separados. Y en las mesas de contactos de trabajo y de conversaciones de la cruz roja Norte-Sur, preparadas por la iniciativa de la parte Norte, recurrio siempre a los complots y creo obstaculos presentando el problema de los supuestos "secuestrados por el Norte", el de "prisioneros del ejercito surcoreano" y la "regularizacion".
					
					 Desde 2008 hasta la fecha, el encuentro de familiares y parientes separados se realizo solo en dos ocasiones, lo cual muestra que la banda titere surcoreana trato con infidelidad e insinceridad esta labor humanitaria. 
					
					 Censuro la entrega y recibo de materiales humanitarios entre el Norte y el Sur hablando de la "transparencia" y "uso exclusivo para la rama militar" e impidio entregar a la parte Norte ni un grano de arroz ni un gramo de cemento. 
					
					 Cometio mas abiertamente la seduccion y el secuestro colectivo a los habitantes norcoreanos. 
					
					 En virtud de la ley fascista, los titeres surcoreanos ejecutaron bestialmente a las entidades del movimiento por la reunificacion y las personalidades medulares tildandoles de "subordinados al Norte", "elementos pro-Norte" y "espias". 
					
					 Los casos de represion a las entidades de movimiento pro-reunificacion en virtud de la "ley de seguridad" se aumentaron mas de 4 veces en comparacion con el periodo del "poder" anterior y el numero de las personalidades patrioticas pro-reunificacion detenidas injustamente llega a cientos.
					
					 Lee Myung Bak nego los principios fundamentales de la reunificacion de la patria y las relaciones Norte-Sur y recurrio freneticamente al enfrentamiento de sistemas abogando por la "reunificacion bajo el sistema democratico liberal", "la reunificacion al estilo aleman" y la "situacion de emergencia". 
					
					 Lo mas grave del caso es que desarrollo la campana de DDHH anti-RPDC insultando la maxima dignidad y el regimen socialista mas ventajoso de la RPDC diciendo que "no podemos vivir junto con el Norte en el mundo claro ni creerlo como una parte connacional" y "hay que dar trato diferente al poder del Norte y a sus habitantes". 
					
					 Los titeres surcoreanos, enloquecidos por la "doctrina de derrumbe" de alguien, hablaron de que "la reunificacion puede llegar en una medianoche como un ladron", se refirieron a la "educacion de reunificacion" y los "impuestos de reunificacion" y resucitaron la "teoria de enemigo principal". 
					
					 Completaron nuevamente en contubernio con su amo norteamericano los guiones de guerra de agresion contra la RPDC tales como el "plan operacional 5027" y el "plan operacional 5029". Y para ponerlos en practica, desarrollaron freneticamente los ejercicios militares conjuntos de gran envergadura como "Key Resolve", "Foal Eagle" y "Ulji Freedom Guardian". 
					
					 Durante 4 anos pasados, se libraron en mas de mil 600 ocasiones los ejercicios belicos de distintos tipos contra la RPDC. 
					
					 Lee Myung Bak violo flagrantemente la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre y desarrollo aventureros alborotos belicos anti-RPDC aumentando en gran medida las fuerzas armadas agresoras en los alrededores de las cinco islas del Mar Oeste. 
					
					 En marzo y noviembre de 2010, invento el caso de hundimiento de la corbeta "Cheonan" y el de fuego artillero en la isla Yonphyong, llevando la situacion al borde de guerra. 
					
					 Para colmo, lejos de expresar condolencias a la connacional RPDC entristecida por el gran duelo nacional, ordeno al ejercito, la policia, los oficinistas y hasta las embajadas surcoreanas en el extranjero entrar en el estado de alerta. E impidio a los habitantes surcoreanos expresar condolencias, enviar grupos de pesame, instalar altares de incensacion y viajar a Pyongyang. 
					
					 En particular, considero el gran duelo nacional como una buena oportunidad para lograr su meta siniestra y se valio de las maniobras de toda indole para destruir la unidad monolitica de la RPDC y a la larga, se burlo hasta de las lagrimas de sangre de los connacionales del Norte. 
					
					 Mientras que la banda traidora de Lee Myung Bak se mantenga en el poder, las relaciones intercoreanas no podran evitar la ruptura y sufriran los desastres de guerra. 
					
					 Esto es la conclusion final y balance que sacamos de los 4 anos de mandato de Lee.

articles.title: ACNC comenta auto-evaluacion del "poder" de Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
ACNC comenta auto-evaluacion del "poder" de Lee Myung Bak
 Pyongyang, 21 de febrero (ACNC) -- Recientemente, el titere Ministerio de Reunificacion del Sur de Corea publico unos datos en que evaluo asi: "durante 4 anos de mandato del 'poder' de Lee Myung Bak, se ha sentado la base para normalizar las relaciones intercoreanas".
					 Es muy vil el intento con que el "poder" de Lee publico esos datos sobre los supuestos "exitos significativos" justamente cuando las relaciones N-S se hallan en el peor estado de la historia.
					
					 Es un truco barato para evadir la responsabilidad de la ruptura de las relaciones intercoreanas y evitar el castigo de la historia.
					
					 Es absurdo que el "poder" de Lee, autor principal de la quiebra de las relaciones N-S, hablara del "aseguramiento de la base" para el desarrollo de esos vinculos.
					
					 Desde que tomo el "poder", Lee califico la epoca del 15 de Junio de "10 anos perdidos" y persiguio la "estrategia de espera" del supuesto "estado de emergencia" en la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					 Nego la historica Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre y presento "la desnuclearizacion, apertura y 3 mil dolares" como su "politica sobre el Norte".
					
					 Calumnio sin titubeos el ideal comun de la nacion por la reunificacion "Entre nosotros, los connacionales" como la "estrategia del Norte".
					
					 Ha declarado que sujetaria las relaciones intercoreanas a las con fuerzas extranjeras y se ofrecio como sirviente en el dominio colonial y la politica agresiva de EE.UU.
					
					 Al negar la reconciliacion, la unidad y la reunificacion de la nacion y perseguir el enfrentamiento de regimenes, llevo al extremo la desconfianza entre ambas partes coreanas y convirtio las relaciones intercoreanas en las sumamente hostiles.
					
					 La banda de traidores interrumpio los dialogos de varias ramas, que venian realizandose bien despues de la epoca del 15 de Junio, bajo el pretexto del problema nuclear y la "disculpa" y llevo al fracaso otras citas iniciadas por los esfuerzos activos de la RPDC.
					
					 La realidad prueba claramente que dejando intacta la politica conflictiva anti-reunificacion de la banda de conservadores liderados por Lee Myung Bak, no se puede sacar de la catastrofe las relaciones N-S y estas empeoraran cada dia mas.
					
					 La banda de Lee sera castigada duro por la historia como traidores a toda la nacion coreana.
